creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: recto: landscape with low horizon line; two trees at left, one at right; foliage at horizon line; some white clouds; verso: slumped, sad man seated on a chair, with elbows on thighs; swirling ghostly figure behind man
medium: Pen, brush and ink and wash (?), colored pencil (or pastel?) and graphite on grey paper
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: Untitled, recto and verso [landscape, recto; sad man with spirits, verso]
